scripts.test:unit: cd client && bun run test && cd ../server && bun run test:unit
scripts.test:ci: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration && bun run test:scripts:ci
scripts.test:coverage:ci: bun --filter './client' test:coverage:ci && bun --filter './server' test:coverage:ci && test -s ./client/coverage/lcov.info && test -s ./server/coverage/lcov.info && test -s ./client/coverage/junit.xml && test -s ./server/coverage/junit.xml && echo 'Coverage artifacts verified: client/coverage/lcov.info, server/coverage/lcov.info, client/coverage/junit.xml, server/coverage/junit.xml'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules .turbo wrangler.toml client/.env .dev.vars
scripts.lint:actions: actionlint -shellcheck= -ignore 'the runner of ".*" action is too old to run on GitHub Actions'
scripts.lint:biome: bunx @biomejs/biome@2.4.0 lint --files-ignore-unknown=true client server packages cli docs scripts package.json turbo.json biome.json
scripts.lint: bun run lint:actions && bun run lint:yaml && bun run lint:biome
